channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pivotal Research hikes Netflix price target to Street-high $1,100 after Tyson-Paul fight
item.description: The record-breaking numbers for the match between Mike Tyson and Jake Paul show Netflix's preeminence in the streaming sector, per Pivotal Research.

item.title: Comcast to spin off NBCU cable TV channels
item.description: The new $7 billion company would reportedly include MSNBC, CNBC, Oxygen, E!, USA Network, Syfy, and Golf Channel.

item.title: Here’s how escalating Russia tensions could impact markets and supply chains, according to experts
item.description: The conflict could affect natural resources used in the production of semiconductors.

item.title: Employees are spending the equivalent of a month’s grocery bill on the return to the office–and growing more resentful than ever, survey finds
item.description: The average employee returning to the office spends $561 per month–that's the average two-person household’s grocery bill in the U.S. for the entire m...

item.title: European Central Bank warns rising trade tensions increased risks to financial stability
item.description: The Financial Stability Review also said weak growth was now a bigger threat to the 20-nation euro zone than high inflation.

item.title: Ex-Nomura staffer charged after attempted murder at elderly client’s home
Rene Magritte painting ‘Empire of Light’ nets auction record of $121 million at Christie’s in New York
item.description: "Empire of Light" was part of the private collection of Mica Ertegun, an interior designer who fled communist Romania to settle in the U.S. where she ...

item.title: U.S. closes embassy in Kyiv over potential 'significant' air attack as tensions with Russia soar
item.description: The U.S. has closed its embassy in Kyiv, warning that it has "received specific information of a potential significant air attack" on Wednesday.

item.title: Delta forecasts more sales growth in 2025 thanks to high-end demand, 'resilient economy'
item.description: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.

item.title: Disney debuts its latest cruise ship, Treasure, as part of a plan to double its fleet by 2031
item.description: The Disney Treasure will make its maiden voyage in December, officially becoming the sixth ship in the company's cruise line.

item.title: Target shares slump 20% after retailer posts big earnings miss, cuts forecast
Wall Street lowers expectations for profits in 2025. Should investors worry?
Airline exodus leaves Israelis and their companies isolated
item.description: Of the 20 airlines that dominated the market before the war, Israeli companies are nearly the only ones remaining.

item.title: Eurozone negotiated wages rose 5.42% in 3Q, versus +3.54% in 2Q
Comcast stock gains on report that NBCUniversal cable networks will be spun off
